casebody.data:
Richard G. SCHMIDT, M.D.
v.
Steven LEBOON and Cassandra Leboon Petition of: Steven Leboon Richard G. Schmidt, M.D.
v.
Steven Leboon and Cassandra Leboon Petition of: Cassandra Leboon No. 156 MAL 2018
No. 157 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. October 30, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 30th day of October, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.

Justice Wecht did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
